knimeNode.name: Uniq
knimeNode.shortDescription: Output the uniq rows from a sorted table

fullDescription.intro:
Output the uniq rows from a sorted table. A Column Resorter Might be needed.
References
Knime4Bio. Author: Pierre Lindenbaum PhD, INSERM UMR 915, Institut du thorax, Nantes. Reference: manuscript in preparation. Please, report any problem here.
fullDescription.option: Prints everything but appends a new column with the number of times the row was seen (warning:consummes memory)
